verses.verse: And there <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5357>vials,<s%> and <S%G2980>talked<s%> with me, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G1204>Come<s%> <S%G1204>here;<s%> I will <S%G1166>show<s%> to you the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>whore<s%> that <S%G2521>sits<s%> on <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters:<s%>

With <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have <S%G4203>committed<s%> <S%G4203>fornication,<s%> and the <S%G2730>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have been <S%G3182>made<s%> <S%G3182>drunk<s%> with the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of her <S%G4202>fornication.<s%>

<S%G2532>So<s%> he <S%G667>carried<s%> me <S%G667>away<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness:<s%> and I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> on a <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> colored <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3686>names<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> in <S%G4209>purple<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> <S%G4392>color,<s%> and <S%G5558>decked<s%> with <S%G5557>gold<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G3135>pearls,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> in her <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G946>abominations<s%> and <S%G168>filthiness<s%> of her <S%G4202>fornication:<s%>

And on her <S%G3359>forehead<s%> was a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3466>MYSTERY,<s%> <S%G897>BABYLON<s%> THE <S%G3173>GREAT,<s%> THE <S%G3384>MOTHER<s%> OF <S%G4204>HARLOTS<s%> AND <S%G946>ABOMINATIONS<s%> OF THE <S%G1093>EARTH.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3184>drunken<s%> with the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and with the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G3144>martyrs<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> and when I <S%G1492>saw<s%> her, I <S%G2296>wondered<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2295>admiration.<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, <S%G1302>Why<s%> did you <S%G2296>marvel?<s%> I will <S%G2046>tell<s%> you the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G941>carries<s%> her, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

The <S%G2342>beast<s%> that you <S%G1492>saw<s%> was, and is not; and shall <S%G305>ascend<s%> out of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> pit, and <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G684>perdition:<s%> and they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2296>wonder,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> were not <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> when they <S%G991>behold<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that was, and is not, and <S%G2539>yet<s%> is.

And <S%G5602>here<s%> is the <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%> The <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> are <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3699>which<s%> <S%G846><s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sits.<s%>

And there are <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G935>kings:<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> are <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> is, and the <S%G243>other<s%> is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come;<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G2064>comes,<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> a <S%G3641>short<s%> space.
And the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that was, and is not, <S%G2532>even<s%> he is the <S%G3590>eighth,<s%> and is of the <S%G2033>seven,<s%> and <S%G5217>goes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G684>perdition.<s%>

And the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> are <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G935>kings,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3768>no<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> as <S%G3768>yet;<s%> but <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> as <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> with the <S%G2342>beast.<s%>
<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1106>mind,<s%> and shall <S%G1239>give<s%> their <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G1849>strength<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> shall <S%G4170>make<s%> <S%G4170>war<s%> with the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> and the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> shall <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them: for he is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2634>lords,<s%> and <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G935>kings:<s%> and they that are with him are <S%G2822>called,<s%> and <S%G1588>chosen,<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, The <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G4204>whore<s%> <S%G2521>sits,<s%> are <S%G2992>peoples,<s%> and <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> and <S%G1484>nations,<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>

And the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> on the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> shall <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G4204>whore,<s%> and shall <S%G4160>make<s%> her <S%G2049>desolate<s%> and <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> her <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and <S%G2618>burn<s%> her with <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>put<s%> in their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4160>fulfill<s%> his <S%G1106>will,<s%> and to <S%G4160>agree,<s%> <S%G6639><s%> <S%G1106><s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> their <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> shall be <S%G5055>fulfilled.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> is that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>reigns<s%> <S%G932><s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
